name: WOW Concept
description: A visually rich e-commerce site for WOW, chained department store in Spain.The challenge is to maintain performance while dealing with tones of animations. Yet we need to complete within 3 months.

name: Pinterview
description: I have designed the UI and made technical decision to used Vue 2, working with two other frontends. It is an interview testing program for internal hiring process. It is also used for mock interviews for developers preparing for certifications.

name: Model Training
description: Data cleansing and model training for academic research. Models like DiffAct and MTCN2 are used. The model is trained to recognize ball types and start-end for tennis game videos.

name: Ohgar
description: A brand based in Europe, had both traditional and SPA site to maintain. Ohgar sales living goods.
